title: PRE_APPROVED Documents Cannot Revert to DRAFT for Re-Review

comment:
Review complete. Document verified as COMPLIANT with SOP-003 requirements.

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "Executable Document Checkout Workflow Gaps" - present and descriptive
- revision_summary: "Simplified scope; finalized versioning model" - acceptable for v0.x executable document

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (per SOP-003 Section 5):
- Section 1 Purpose: Present - clearly states why INV exists
- Section 2 Scope: Complete with Context, Deviation Type (Procedural), Systems Affected
- Section 3 Background: Complete with Expected/Current behavior tables and timeline
- Section 4 Description: Detailed facts for both deviations with evidence
- Section 5 Impact Assessment: Complete with systems, documents, and other impacts
- Section 6 Root Cause Analysis: Identifies fundamental cause and contributing factors
- Section 7 Remediation Plan: CAPA table with proposed requirements REQ-WF-016, REQ-WF-017
- Sections 8-10: Execution sections present with appropriate placeholders

INV WARRANTED (per SOP-003 Section 4.1): Yes - root cause required analysis, issue is systemic, formal CAPA appropriate.

CAPA APPROPRIATENESS: CAPA-001 correctly typed as Corrective; proposes implementation via child CR with specific requirements addressing both gaps.

No placeholder content in pre-approved sections (1-6). No typos or formatting errors found.

INV-007 Post-Execution Review: COMPLIANT

VERIFIED:

1. Frontmatter
   - title: 'Executable Document Checkout Workflow Gaps'
   - revision_summary: 'Simplified scope; finalized versioning model'

2. Document Structure
   - All 10 required sections present (Purpose, Scope, Background, Description of Deviations, Impact Assessment, Root Cause Analysis, Remediation Plan, Execution Comments, Execution Summary, References)

3. CAPA Table (Section 7)
   - CAPA-001: Implementation = CR-048, Outcome = Pass, Verified By = qa - 2026-02-02

4. CAPA Completion Evidence
   - CR-048 status: CLOSED (verified via qms_status)
   - CR-048 audit trail confirms: CLOSE event 2026-02-02T20:35:48
   - 11/11 qualification tests passed per execution record
   - SDLC-QMS-RS v7.0 and SDLC-QMS-RTM v8.0 EFFECTIVE

5. Execution Comments (Section 8)
   - Three documented entries with signatures
   - Final entry: 'CR-048 post-reviewed, approved, and CLOSED. CAPA-001 verified complete.' - qa - 2026-02-02

6. Execution Summary (Section 9)
   - Status: 'Complete - All CAPAs verified'
   - Root Cause documented: Checkout command status-agnostic design
   - Corrective Action documented: CR-048 implemented status-aware checkout
   - Verification: CR-048 CLOSED with passing tests and EFFECTIVE documents
   - Effectiveness statement present

7. Placeholder Content
   - None found (no TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX)

8. Traceability
   - SOP-001, SOP-003, SDLC-QMS-RS, CR-043 referenced

9. Formatting
   - Consistent throughout; no errors detected

RECOMMEND for post-approval.
